pullrequest.title: changed error message in Optitrack to gzlog

content.raw:
How often is it being printed? Even `gzlog` messages can be problematic: see the [gazebo answers post with my favorite title ever](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/5439/giant-log-file-of-doooooooooooooooooooooooooooom/).

It would take more code, but we could throttle the message even further if the log file size is an issue. Do you know how fast it grows with this message?
content.html:
How often is it being printed? Even gzlog messages can be problematic: see the gazebo answers post with my favorite title ever.

It would take more code, but we could throttle the message even further if the log file size is an issue. Do you know how fast it grows with this message?
